remarks: Change first bound variable in an ordered-pair class abstraction, using explicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Oct-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2016.)
statement:
cbvopab1.1 $e |- F/ z ph $.
cbvopab1.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
cbvopab1.3 $e |- ( x = z -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvopab1 $p |- { <. x , y >. | ph } = { <. z , y >. | ps } $.
$d x y $.
$d y z $.
